alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Prince George; Southampton; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 9:24AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Isle of Wight, eastern Southampton, central Prince George, northeastern Sussex and western Surry Counties and the City of Franklin through 1015 AM EDT... At 924 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wakefield, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, heavy rain and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Windsor, Waverly, Courtland, Wakefield, Sussex, Ivor, Dendron, Homeville, Hunterdale, Sedley, Carrsville, Elberon, Cabin Point, Zuni, Vicksville, Taylors Corner, Booth Fork, Carsley and Booker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Isle of Wight; Prince George; Southampton; Surry; Sussex
